Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Evelyn Lulis is an Associate Professor at CDM. She earned a B.S. in psychology and a B.S. in mathematics from the University of Illinois, and a PhD from the Illinois Institute of Technology. Research interests include: computing ethics; artificial intelligence; medical expert systems; the implementation of analogy, similarity, and metaphor; cognitive science; computational linguistics; technology education.
